pages.text: The Cold Snap Gunner was given a toy gun when they were made. When left alone, the gunner would practice their marksmanship. Now they aim for the eyes of any player they meet. Their aim would be better, if their own eyes weren't made of coal...

pages.title: Nether Gunner
pages.text: A Gunner, melted from the heat of the Nether. No one knows how or why a horde of snowmen decided going to the Nether would be a good idea, but those that have leave behind a trail of slush when they move.

pages.title: End Gunner
pages.text: A gunner, mutated by the desolate environments of the end. Has a chance to teleport you or itself when attacking or attacked

pages.title: Plague Gunner
pages.text: A gunner filled with the murky waters of the swamp. May transmit parasites and diseases, or generally make you feel unwell
